token-variants.SearchPathsHint: Place all the paths to the folders you want to be included in the token art search.
token-variants.DisableCachingHint: Disables caching of token art paths. Saves some memory but greatly impacts the search speed.
token-variants.FilterMSRDHint: Excludes token variants for tokens with names not included in the D&D 5e Monster (SRD) list.
token-variants.FilterMSRDError: Token name is not part of D&D 5e Monster (SRD):
token-variants.KeywordSearchHint: Searches both using full name and individual words in the name of the actor/token. Words less than 3 characters are ignored.
token-variants.ExcludedKeywordsHint: This is a list of keywords that will not be included in the search when 'Search by Keyword' is on.
